databaseDelay:::90000000!!!pythonScript:::import time

from pywinauto.application import Application

fileName = "D:\\TW_SPRINT\\TW_SPRINT_3\\Supported Files\\pythonfile.txt"
findText = "Java"
newText = "Python"

app = Application().start(cmd_line=u'Notepad.exe')
notepad = app.Notepad
notepad.wait('ready')
time.sleep(1)
notepad.menu_item(u'&File->&Open...\tCtrl+O').click()

open_window = app.Open
open_window.wait('ready')
time.sleep(1)
edit_text = open_window.Edit
edit_text.type_keys(fileName)
time.sleep(2)
open_button = open_window[u'&Open']
open_button.click()

notepad.menu_item(u'&File->Page Set&up...').click()

page_setup_window = app.Dialog
left_box = page_setup_window.Edit

left_box.right_click()
time.sleep(1)
app.PopupMenu.menu_item('Select &All').click_input()
left_box.right_click()
time.sleep(1)
app.PopupMenu.menu_item('Copy').click_input()
header_box = page_setup_window.Edit5
header_box.right_click()
time.sleep(1)
app.PopupMenu.menu_item('Past').click_input()
time.sleep(1)
cancel_button = page_setup_window.Cancel
cancel_button.click()
time.sleep(1)
notepad.menu_item(u'&Edit->&Replace...\tCtrl+H').click()
time.sleep(1)
replace_window = app.Dialog
find_what_box = replace_window.Edit
find_what_box.set_edit_text(u'')
find_what_box.type_keys(findText)
time.sleep(1)
replace_with_box = replace_window.Edit2
replace_with_box.set_edit_text(u'')
replace_with_box.type_keys(newText)
time.sleep(1)
replace_all_button = replace_window.Button3
replace_all_button.click()
time.sleep(1)
cancel_button = replace_window.Cancel
cancel_button.click()
time.sleep(1)
notepad.menu_item(u'&File->E&xit').click()

try:
    if (app.Dialog.is_visible()):
        time.sleep(1)
        app.Dialog[u'&Save'].click()
except:
    pass

print("Done.")
